title: Connectivity Issues
body: Anyone else having issues where you are in Champion Select and then it suddenly says your client has crashed and your only option is to close league? This problem has happened for 2 days now and I am worried I am about to be banned.

replies.body: Im getting the same error. I tried submitting the problem to a help thread on here, but after 20 hours I haven't received a response. Im sitting on a 1 hour long queue ban right now, sucks that REiot's problems are screwing us over.
